text:
925 East Tremont Ave., adjoining the N.E. corner of Daly Ave., showing Engine 45 of the New York Fire Department.

July 23, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bronx: East Tremont Avenue - No. 925

text:
933 to 937 (left to right) East Tremont Ave., north side, between Daly and Vyse Aves.

P. L. Sperr.

April 4, 1936.
title: Bronx: East Tremont Avenue - No. 933 to 937.

text:
937 to 941 East Tremont Ave., west of and adjoining the N.W. corner of Vyse Ave. The old 2-story frame house in the center is No. 939.

April 4, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bronx: East Tremont Avenue - No. 937 to 941.
